summary: Adds a Mammoth Tusk Bow to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Mammoth Tusk Bow to the game. You can find it behind the sawmill, next to the table in Riverwood. It does a few points more damage than a hunting bow. I attribute this to the catgut(Khajiit) bow string donated by a rogue Khajiit near the Valenwood border.

This is basically a retexture of the hunting bow, but is a standalone mod.

This is my first mod, so be gentle..lol
author: Zanidyn
